text: Hi how are you
Good! How are you?
Tired, but i am ready to work
That sums me up pretty well.
We think alike  we have great minds
Awesome! Did you do anything interesting today?
Today i like to ask you about donations. As for interesting things, just waking up.
Great! What would you like to ask me?
Have you heard of charity called save the children
I don't believe I have.
They are a trusting organization that helps children that are homeless, sick, etc. Children and animals i care most for to be honest.
That sounds nice.
Any donation would be appreciated. Would you like to donate?
Unfortunately, I would need to read a bit more about the organization before I donate. But thank you for awaring me!
Ok. When you have time, please research save the children. They help save thousands of innocent lives everyday. If you can, even 5 cents that would be great.
I will! Do you know which region they support?
I believe its global around entire world that i know of.
I always like to know how much of the donated amount actually reaches the NGO. Alot of times these organizations have quite a large overhead.
The exact number i am unsure of to be honest. But i know for sure they are caring abd and legitimate.
I read recently in the news about an NGO with a similiar name that only donate like, 10 percent of the actual amount to charity.
Yes that is correct. But you do not have to do that much
Ok. I will donate $.10. Like you said, even a small amount helps.
Yes that would be appreciated. Thank you so much.
Have a great one!
U 2. Enjoy your Wednesday
